description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Hellas Verona vs Parma in the Serie A
title: Hellas Verona vs Parma: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Hellas Verona vs Parma: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt missed. Casper Tengstedt (Verona) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Suat Serdar with a cross.
Post
Attempt blocked. Jacob Ondrejka (Parma) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Emanuele Valeri (Parma) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Dennis Man following a corner.
